timeline.body:
Maybe you can reuse the `getAdditionalParams` method as we have for this as above? Something like below

```suggestion
                queryString = getAdditionalParams(queryString, "withData", Collections.singletonList(withData));
```

If above suggestion is not suitable, then I would suggest to add this check `queryString != null` in the condition (`queryString.isEmpty()`), so we make the code more robust. Right now `queryString` won't be `null` but maybe in future `getAdditionalParams` or `getSortingQueryString` methods may change their implementation and return a `null` instead.

What do you think?
timeline.bodyHTML:
Maybe you can reuse the getAdditionalParams method as we have for this as above? Something like below

Suggested change
if (queryString.isEmpty()) {
queryString+= "?withData=true";
} else {
queryString+= "&withData=true";
}
queryString = getAdditionalParams(queryString, "withData", Collections.singletonList(withData));

If above suggestion is not suitable, then I would suggest to add this check queryString != null in the condition (queryString.isEmpty()), so we make the code more robust. Right now queryString won't be null but maybe in future getAdditionalParams or getSortingQueryString methods may change their implementation and return a null instead.

What do you think?
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.body:
I know you haven't changed this, but I think it's a good chance now to solve this small issue. 
We are trying to print out 2 values bug we are passing 3 in the log, thus it makes log output not really useful. Should be something like:

```suggestion
                        logger.debug("About to look for case instances by data item name {} with status {}", dataItemName, status);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
I know you haven't changed this, but I think it's a good chance now to solve this small issue.
We are trying to print out 2 values bug we are passing 3 in the log, thus it makes log output not really useful. Should be something like:

Suggested change
logger.debug("About to look for case instances by data item name {} with status {}", dataItemName, dataItemValue, status);
logger.debug("About to look for case instances by data item name {} with status {}", dataItemName, status);
timeline.author: afalhambra

timeline.body:
Arrays should not be created for varargs parameters
```suggestion
                    (KieServerCommand) new DescriptorCommand("CaseQueryService", "getCaseInstancesAnyRole", safeList(status), page, pageSize, sort, sortOrder, withData)) );
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Arrays should not be created for varargs parameters

Suggested change
(KieServerCommand) new DescriptorCommand("CaseQueryService", "getCaseInstancesAnyRole", new Object[]{safeList(status), page, pageSize, sort, sortOrder, withData})) );
(KieServerCommand) new DescriptorCommand("CaseQueryService", "getCaseInstancesAnyRole", safeList(status), page, pageSize, sort, sortOrder, withData)) );
